caption:
This photograph depicts a train station scene. From the viewer's perspective, we are on a train platform looking down a set of multiple railway lines, which converge in the distance. A train is approaching on the nearest track, moving toward the station.

The platform shelter, visible in the right foreground, has a white underside with several hanging dome-shaped lights. The platform itself looks clean and is marked with a safety line close to the edge. There's a sign that reads "DANGER DO NOT PASS," mounted on a pole by the track, indicating a safety warning for passengers.

Buildings surround the train station. To the left, there is a narrow multi-story residential building with balconies. In the background, various other buildings can be seen, some of which appear residential, contributing to a sense of an urban environment.

The surrounding area includes lush green trees under a clear, sunny sky, which gives the scene a pleasant, lively atmosphere despite the industrial elements of the railway tracks and the train infrastructure.
title: MBTA (Metropolitan Boston Transit Authority) tracks cut across Neptune Road
